extendedInfo.description: Now you can go to any adult site you want to see and you'll no longer have to worry about the possibility of your wife, girlfriend, friends or family finding out.  We use Pingjam business caller id (optional) and other advertisements to help support this Free version.  Please note that all ads are hand picked and are safe to use.  (18+ ONLY)***PLEASE Watch the video BEFORE rating/uninstalling.  Questions? Problems? info@turbodeveloping.com  **Video tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=esKV7pz9GR0*No ads version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.andromo.dev58932.app202515Try it and you'll say goodbye to those really obvious porno icons and web browser history that leave clues about where you've been online. Your browsing history stays hidden because the app's icon looks like a typical Calculator app and when you open it up, there is a Google search engine that lets you go to any website you desire, secretly!  Go anywhere you want to go and do it without worry!  Finally, Freedom and its FREE.It's fast too!  It is a pure and simple Android browser, so it speeds through your favorite sites with ease. There's no clutter to slow it down like most phone's standard factory browsers with integrated bloatware.  Its also very very small (1mb), so you'll have plenty of room to add it to your device and It won't take up your valuable space.So, don't get caught red handed with obvious porn icons on your phone or tablet. Give Hidden Porn Browser Free a look and see what all the hype is about.  Features:-Disguised app icon named "Calculator Free"-The fast, pure Android web browser hides search history and makes your tracks invisible.-Large, easy to click buttons for smaller phones.-Google search for any site you are looking for, anonymously and without a visible browser history.-Quick developer response should you ever need help. info@turbodeveloping.com How to use this app:1. Install2. Start streaming video and browsing pics anonymously using the "Calculator" icon.It's really that easy. :) Tips:-Long Press (hold down) your phone's back button to close down multiple windows within the app.-During app installation you will be prompted with a check box for "Automatic Updates".  The real name of the app will be revealed in your notification bar IF you allow the app to update automatically.  You can always manually update as needed.  Visit www.turbodeveloping.com for variations of this app such as "Angry Beavers".  It's virtually the same app, but it has a more obscure title if you choose to update automatically.  -If the hidden icon isn't enough and the Google search box is trying to store your search history (a few reports), you can manually clear the history after browsing by typing "calculator" in the search box (or any other word you've used before), then hit "Clear History". If you don't see the option to clear, just hit your device's back button to move the virtual keyboard out of the way.  Developers note:  First of all...THANK YOU!  I get so many positive reviews and e-mails. Please contact me at info@turbodeveloping.com or http://www.facebook.com/turbodeveloping if you have any questions, concerns, suggestions." Mike*Please keep in mind that using this free Hidden Porn Browser while keeping pre-existing porn and porn apps on your phone would obviously be a bad idea since we can only hide our "Calculator" appearing app.*This app doesn't contain pictures or videos of pornography, partially, naked, nude, Indian, Hindi, Turkish, or Japanese ãã«ãã® girls, sex or any other provocative graphical material.  All media within the app is user generated!*This application uses Google Analytics to anonymously track usage data within the application.*The Pro version that removes our banner ad is now offered!We listened! The new Pro (No-Ads) version is now shown in the screenshots and is available here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.andromo.dev58932.app167373

reviews.title: Great work, but...
reviews.comment: Nice and polished app and it really does what it says. The calculater icon is very good and it also works... But, i\'m sorry i didn\'t read the discription before, i thought it will also unblock porn web sites, but it didn\'t, So this app has no use to me cuz no one touches my phone without my permission. But still it\'s an excellent work!
reviews.author: Usman Tariq

reviews.title: This is great
reviews.comment: Nice work but I can just go on Firefox and use the new incogneto tab if I don\'t want anyone finding out I was watching porn.
